title: Lonely Ghosts
description: Lonely Ghosts is a short story of loss set in the backwoods of America where small town secrets and repressed desires threaten to fully shatter an already cracked family.After the sudden death of her husband, Lisa Percy begins to lose herself in grief and depression. Desperate she turns to her former brother-in-law for help in exorcising the pain.John Percy possesses a rare Sight that allows him to see and manipulate the emotions of others. But he is haunted by past choices and an unrequited passion.Helping her won't be easy because an old and powerful magic connects them and it runs deeper than either of them realize.
author: Alex  Foster
